title: Foundation Model or Finetune? Evaluation of few-shot semantic segmentation for river pollution
details: M Don, S Pinson, BG Cebrian, YM Asano - arXiv preprint arXiv:2409.03754, 2024
abstract: Foundation models (FMs) are a popular topic of research in AI. Their ability to generalize to new tasks and datasets without retraining or needing an abundance of data makes them an appealing candidate for applications on specialist datasets. In …
